Container.Name: PlexPosterUpdater
Container.Overview: Update your bad Plex Movie posters with this easy to use (hopefully) tool

Config.Name: Plex URL
Config.Description: The required plex port. Add the :32400 at the end

Config.Name: PLEX TOKEN
Config.Description: Your Plex token, you can get this from the plex web application

Config.Name: TMDB API
Config.Description: You need to sign up to TMDB (https://www.themoviedb.org) and get your api key.

Config.Name: PLEX LIBRARY
Config.Description: This is what your movie library in plex is called. Either Films, or Movies or whatever.

Config.Name: WEB PORT
Config.Description: Web Port for your application, mine defaulted to 5000

Config.Name: Time Range
Config.Description: Default value which the application starts with, leave unchanged.
